text: Savvy & Mandy is a country-pop duo from Southern California in the United States. Savvy and Mandy are sisters, Savannah Shay Burhoe (born August 10, 1993) and Amanda Quinn Burhoe (born October 12, 1995). The Burhoe sisters professional career began with acting and modeling at the ages of 9 and 11. ==See also== *Clique Girlz *The Stunners *The Veronicas *Prima J *Nina Sky *Danity Kane *The Pussycat Dolls Category:American girl groups Category:American musical groups
title: Savvy & Mandy
